recipe.title: Avocado-Goat Cheese Salad with Lime Dressing
ingredients: 1 5-ounce package soft fresh goat cheese or cotija cheese, crumbled
instructions: Toss first 4 ingredients in large bowl. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add avocado and goat cheese; toss gently. Divide salad among plates.
